1TF.SG.summary: Tipco Foods Public Company Limited produces and distributes processed fruits, fresh fruits, fruit juices, vegetable juices, natural mineral water, and ready-to-drink beverages in Thailand. The company is also involved in operating food and drink shops; and herbal extracts and farming business. It operates through Products of Vegetable & Fruit, Beverage, and Other segments. The company offers processed fruit products that include canned pineapple, pineapple juice concentrate, aseptic crushed pineapple, pineapple in plastic cup, pineapple in retort pouch, canned tropical fruit salad, tropical fruit salad in plastic cup, canned aloe vera, aseptic crushed aloe vera, aloe vera in retort pouch, and coconut milk products, as well as provides coconut water. It also produces plant and herbal extracts that serve as ingredients for foods, beverages, cosmetics, dietary supplements, and medicines. In addition, the company produces and distributes ready-to-drink fruit juices and vegetable juices; and ready-to-drink beverages, as well as agricultural products. Further, it operates 34 Squeeze Juice Bar by Tipco shops, including 11 company branches and 23 franchise branches that serve smoothies, and healthy drinks and foods. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Thai Pineapple PLC. Tipco Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ABICO-R.BK.summary: Abico Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, produces and distributes ready-to-drink milk. It is also involved in the rental of office space; and dairy farming business. The company is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

ABICO.BK.summary: Abico Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, produces and distributes ready-to-drink milk. It is also involved in the rental of office space; and dairy farming business. The company is based in Lam Luk Ka, Thailand.

CBG-R.BK.summary: Carabao Group Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, manufactures, markets, distributes, and sells beverages in Thailand and internationally. Its products primarily include carbonated and non-carbonated energy drinks, drinking water, ready-to-drink coffee, instant powder 3-in-1 coffee, and electrolyte drinks under the Carabao Dang, Carabao, Carabao Sport, and Start Plus brands. The company also manufactures, distributes, and procures glass bottles and aluminum cans. In addition, the company distributes third party products, including food products, such as fresh coconut nectar, tamarind mixed with plum flavor, salted peanuts and broad beans, and green peas; and non-food products comprising toothbrushes, dish washing liquids, fabric softeners, and detergents through cash vans. Carabao Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

Carabao Group Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

HTC-R.BK.summary: Haad Thip Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes soft drinks primarily in Southern Thailand. Its products and brands include Coca Cola, Coke Light, Coke Zero, Fanta, Sprite, Schweppes, Root Beer A&W, Minute Maid Splash, Minute Maid pulpy, Minute Maid Vitamin Kids, and Namthip water. The company manufactures and distributes plastic bottles and semi-finished plastic bottles; and provides plastic bottles blowing service. Haad Thip Public Company Limited is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand.

HTC.BK.summary: Haad Thip Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes soft drinks primarily in Southern Thailand. The company manufactures and distributes plastic bottles and semi-finished plastic bottles; and provides plastic bottles blowing service. Haad Thip Public Company Limited is headquartered in Songkhla, Thailand.

ICHI-R.BK.summary: Ichitan Group Public Company Limited manufactures and sells ready-to-drink tea beverage in Thailand. It offers green tea under the Ichitan Green Tea and Shizuoka Green Tea brands; herbal drink under the Yen Yen by Ichitan brand; green tea mixed nanta de coco products under the Ichitan Chew Chew brand; juice mixed jelly and juice non-carbonated beverage under the Bireley's brand; and energy drink under the T247 brand. The company was formerly known as Mai Tan Company Limited. Ichitan Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ICHI.BK.summary: Ichitan Group Public Company Limited manufactures and sells ready-to-drink tea beverage in Thailand. It offers green tea under the Ichitan Green Tea and Shizuoka Green Tea brands; herbal drink under the Yen Yen by Ichitan brand; green tea mixed nanta de coco products under the Ichitan Chew Chew brand; juice mixed jelly and juice non-carbonated beverage under the Bireley's brand; and energy drink under the T247 brand. The company was formerly known as Mai Tan Company Limited. Ichitan Group Public Company Limited was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

OSP-R.BK.summary: Osotspa Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries manufactures and distributes energy drinks and personal care products worldwide. The company operates in three segments: Beverage, Personal Care, and Others. It offers energy drinks under the M-150, Lipovitan-D, Chalarm, Som in-Sum, White Shark, Shark Energy Drink, and M-Storm brand names; ready-to drink coffee under the M-Presso name; sport drinks under the M-Electrolyte and V+ brands; and functional drinks under the Peptein, Peptein Gold, Calpis, VPlus, C-Vitt, Calpis Lacto, and Slimma brands. The company also provides baby care products under the Babi Mild brand name; male grooming products under the Exit brand; women beauty care products under the Twelve Plus, Plantstory, and Ole Strwaberry brands; healthcare products under the KRISNAKLAN, Utaitip, Tamjai, YATHAD 4, Yixin, and BANNER brands; and confectionery products under the Botan and Ole brand names. In addition, it provides marketing and property rental services; manufactures and distributes glass, and beverage concentrates and premixes; and distributes food, beverages, and cullet products. Further, the company engages in the import, retail, and wholesale of beverages; investing in other companies; provision of research and development services; electronic commerce business; and education and sale of herbal products. Additionally, it obtains licensing fee for use of trademark, as well as provides manufacturing and distribution services. Osotspa Public Company Limited was founded in 1891 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SAPPE-R.BK.summary: Sappe Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes healthy food and beverage products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers functional drinks under the Sappe Beauti Drink, Sappe Beauti Shot, and St. Anna brands; fruit-flavored vitamin water under the B'lue Water brand; fruit-flavored drinks with aloe vera flesh under the Sappe Aloe Vera Drink brand; fruit and ready-to-drink vegetable juices under the Sappe For One Day brand; juices with coconut jelly under the Mogu Mogu brand; and aromatic coconut water under the All Coco brand. It also provides ready-to-drink coffee powder under the Preaw Coffee and SlimFit Coffee; chlorophyll powder under the Preaw Chlorophyll; and dietary supplement powders under the Sappe Beauti Powder brands. In addition, the company offers jelly for health and beauty purpose under the Beauti Jelly; grilled fish snacks under the ZeaMax; shrimp snacks under the Chimdii; jelly format product for men under the Maxtive; and organic soy pudding under the DeNosh brands, as well as imports, exports, and distributes goods. The company was formerly known as Sapanan General Food Company Limited and changed its name to Sappe Public Company Limited in September 2013. Sappe Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SSC-R.BK.summary: Sermsuk Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes soft drinks and beverages in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Carbonated Soft Drink and Non-Carbonated Soft Drink. The company provides drinking water, sport drinks, energy drinks, and other beverages, including tea and soda. It offers its products under the est, Crystal, Jubjai, 100 Plus, Wranger, Powerplus, v-boost, Oishi, and Rock Mountain brands. The company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Sermsuk Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of So Water Co., Ltd.

TACC-R.BK.summary: T.A.C. Consumer Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes beverages in Thailand and internationally. The company provides Zenya, a drink containing green tea and pomegranate; Na-Arun, a milk green tea; Sa-was-dee, a beverage containing Durain, a kind of fruit; Hershey's, a chocolate drink; B2B Drink Dispenser, a dispenser drink; and All CafÃ© instant drink. It also offers hot beverage vending machines, art products, and lifestyle products. In addition, the company engages in the cafÃ© business; and character business under the San-X and Dog Please names. Further, it licenses its products in the territories of Thailand, Singapore, Malaysia, Cambodia, Myanmar, Laos, and Vietnam. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
